  • Potato gherkin salad

    May 8th, 2017

    This is a fresh, light take on potato salad. Generally I find potato salad pretty overly stodgy swimming in heavy mayo. In this version the introduction of pickled gherkin and capers cuts right through the stodge - also I recommend the use of far less mayo than normal. If you donâ€™t like mayo at all, try replacing it with a mustard and balsamic dressing.

  • Poached eggs

    May 8th, 2017

    I feel like poached eggs are the sirloin steak of egg servings. It is as simple a method as there is, the eggs speak for themselves and you can have them cooked to your own liking an hardness - obviously cooked white, runny yolk is optimal!

  • Egg in a cup

    May 8th, 2017

    Initailly people scoff at this recipe as somewhat childish. Then they try it - it is easy, simple, clean and tasty. A really smart way to start the day.

  • Porridge bread

    May 7th, 2017

    A filling wholesome bread based on just oats and yoghurt. So easy and so versatile. You can add all kinds of extra flavours to the basic mix to make speciality artisan loafs.
